            <nav id="auxiliary" class="navbar navbar-aux adjust-on-modal hidden-xs">
    <div class="container">
        <div class="navbar-aux-content collapse navbar-collapse">
            <ul class="nav navbar-nav navbar-left">
                <li class="active main-megamenu-trigger" data-trigger="both">
                    <div class="navbar-aux-content__departments"><i class="em em-burger"></i> Produse                    <span class="sr-only">(deschide megameniul)</span></div>

            </ul>
                                        
                            
                            
                            
                                                                        <script type="text/x-template" id="navbar-aux-menu">
                            <ul class="dropdown-menu" aria-labelledby="navbar-aux-dropdown">
                                                                    <li class="hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg"><a href="https://www.emag.ro/genius?ref=hdr_emag-genius" title="eMAG Genius">eMAG Genius</a></li>
                                                                    <li class="hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg"><a href="https://www.emag.ro/lps/oferta-zilei-download-app-emag?ref=hdr_oferta-zilei" title="Oferta zilei">Oferta zilei</a></li>
                                                                    <li class=" hidden-md hidden-lg"><a href="https://www.emag.ro/lps/ofertele-momentului?ref=hdr_ofertele-momentului" title="Ofertele momentului">Ofertele momentului</a></li>
                                                                    <li class=" hidden-md hidden-lg"><a href="https://www.emag.ro/lps/freshful?ref=hdr_freshful" title="Freshful">Freshful</a></li>
                                                                    <li class="  hidden-lg"><a href="https://www.emag.ro/resigilate?ref=hdr_resigilate" title="Resigilate">Resigilate</a></li>
                                                            </ul>
                        </script>
                        <ul class="nav navbar-nav navbar-left">
                                                            <li class="font-size-sm visible-sm visible-md visible-lg">
                                    <a href="https://www.emag.ro/genius?ref=hdr_emag-genius" title="eMAG Genius">
                                        eMAG Genius
                                    </a>
                                </li>

                                    </a>
                                </li>

        </div>
    </div>
</nav>
                                            
                        <div class="main-container-inner">
                <div class="main-container" id="main-container" role="main">
                                                                                        <section class="user-account page-section mrg-top-lg mrg-btm-sm">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="menu-container pad-btm-xs sidebar-anonymous-user">
    <div class="user-account-sidebar pad-sep-xs pad-hrz-sm">
        <div class="user-account-profile mrg-sep-sm text-center "><div class="user-avatar user-avatar-xl"><div class="thumbnail" style="background-color: #999999">
            <span class="ini">A</span><div class="picture" data-background-image="//s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/static-upload/icon_guest.png" data-loaded="true" style="background-image: url(&quot;//s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/static-upload/icon_guest.png&quot;);"></div></div>
    </div></div>
        <div class="text-center">
            <h3>Hei, acum esti un user anonim. </h3>
            <p class="anonymous-text">Intra in contul tau sau inregistreaza-te pentru a-ti pastra produsele favorite. </p>
            <div class="mrg-top-sm">
                <a href="/user/login?ref=nua_fav_anonymous_login_btn" class="btn btn-primary btn-emag btn-block gtm_oa68gyhxt4">
                    <i class="em em-forward"></i>
                    Intra in cont
                </a>
                <a href="/user/login?ref=nua_fav_anonymous_signup_btn" class="btn btn-block btn-default gtm_v18jn0jp6s">Cont nou</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
            <div class="page-container">
                                    
    <div class="user-account-content page-container ab-delivery-options pad-sep-xs pad-hrz-xs"><div class="js-lists-container lists-container pad-hrz-xs"><div class="clearfix border-bottom-gray">
    <div class="list-title inline-block--middle">
	   <h3 class="listing-page-title js-head-title inline-block--middle mrg-sep-xs">Favorite</h3><span class="products-number hidden-xs js-products-count">0 produse</span></div></div><div>
	<img class="empty-list-img display-block" src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/static-upload/empty_state_favorite.png" alt="empty list img">
</div>
<div class="empty-list-content text-center"><h3 class="mrg-btm-none">Hmm, niciun produs in lista ta.</h3>
    <h3 class="mrg-top-none">Uite niste recomandari care te-ar putea inspira.</h3>
    <p class="mrg-btm-none">Adauga acum la Favorite si fa-ti liste dupa preferinte.</p>
    <p>Le poti share-ui oricand cu prietenii si poti salva la Favorite produsele din cos ca sa le cumperi mai tarziu.<i class="em em-fav_fill text-danger"></i></p><a href="/homepage?ref=fav_anonymous_empty-list_btn" class="btn btn-primary mrg-top-15">Vezi produse</a>
</div>
<div class="products-recently-viewed pad-top-xs"></div>
</div></div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>
                </div>
            </div>

    <div class="container">
        <div class="cookie-banner-content col-xs-12 col-sm-7 col-md-8 col-lg-9">
            <p class="cookie-banner-text mrg-btm-none">
                Pentru scopuri precum afișarea de conținut personalizat, folosim module cookie sau tehnologii similare. Apăsând Accept, ești de acord să permiți colectarea de informații prin cookie-uri sau tehnologii similare. Află in sectiunea <a class="gtm_lmqn0slxa4" href="/help/politica-de-utilizare-cookie-uri" target="_blank">Politica de Cookies</a> mai multe despre cookie-uri, inclusiv despre posibilitatea retragerii acordului.
            </p>
            <div class="cookie-banner-text-overlay visible-xs visible-sm"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-5 col-md-4 col-lg-3 cookie-banner-buttons">
            <button class="btn btn-primary js-accept gtm_h76e8zjgoo btn-block">Accept</button>
            <button class="btn btn-link gtm_r0b1uz06 btn-block js-change-settings">administreaza preferintele</button>
        </div>
    </div>

<script type="text/javascript" id="">var ps_cookie_days=2,ps_click_id=0,queryString=window.location.search.substring(1);if(0<queryString.length)for(var pairs=queryString.split("\x26"),i=0;i<pairs.length;i++){var pairs2=pairs[i].split("\x3d");"emag_click_id"==pairs2[0].toLowerCase()&&(ps_click_id=pairs2[1])}0!=ps_click_id&&top.location.href==window.location.href&&SetCookie("emag_click_id",ps_click_id,ps_cookie_days,".emag.ro");
function WriteCookie(b,d,c){var a=SetCookie.arguments,e=SetCookie.arguments.length,f="/",g=3<e?a[3]:null;a=4<e?a[4]:!1;b=b+"\x3d"+escape(d)+(null==c?"":"; expires\x3d"+c.toGMTString())+(null==f?"":"; path\x3d"+f)+(null==g?"":"; domain\x3d"+g)+(1==a?"; secure":"");document.cookie=b}function SetCookie(b,d,c){var a=new Date;a.setTime(a.getTime()+864E5*c);WriteCookie(b,d,a)};</script>
